SummaryEnglish:
The series features over 30 virtual YouTubers or VTubers â€” characters popularized via videos on streaming services and user-generated content sites.

Each episode will be an omnibus of segments, each highlighting different VTubers. The series will stream on Niconico Live and Periscope simultaneously with the television broadcast.

1.SummaryEnglish: Unaired episode included with volumes 5 of the Blu-ray release.

2.SummaryEnglish: Unaired episode included with volumes 6 of the Blu-ray release.

1.SummaryEnglish: Join Mirai Akari, Cyber Girl Siro, Nekomiya Hinata, the duo from HIMEHINA, and Tsukino Mito as they're joined by their friends from the world of Virtual Youtubers for comedic hijinks.

2.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Medicine... I Feel Hot
2.SummaryEnglish: First it was volcanic fire, and now it's arctic ice?! The Vtubers are in trouble again!

3.SummaryEnglish: This week on Virtual San Looking, witness the rap potential of our main sextet as a viewer challenges them to strut their mic skills!

4.SummaryEnglish: In the finale to Kerin Slayer, find out how Hime and Hina deal with the ballistic Kerin's plans for the elf of his dream!

5.TitleEnglish: One Must Eat Grass From the Side of the Road To Live!
5.SummaryEnglish: The high-minded elven beauty from the land of elves, Elu, arrives in Virtual Town--and hopefully her forest won't burn down while she's gone.

6.SummaryEnglish: In this week's Kerin Slayer, Kerin finally encounters his beloved Elu, but things don't go quite as he planned.

7.SummaryEnglish: Tsukino Mito and her guest debate the merits of electro-shock therapy VS dry footwear.

8.SummaryEnglish: Akari and Hime help a viewer out with their boss' annoying habit.

9.TitleEnglish: Transmigration of an Old Lady's Soul
9.SummaryEnglish: The hostesses of Virtual-San Looking share their tips with a viewer on how to develop a talent to delight the crowd with at parties.

10.TitleEnglish: Letting Your Horse Carry You Whenever
10.SummaryEnglish: It's the crossover battle that you never imagined wanting, as Himehina team up with the Game Club to take on an out-of-control Kerin!

11.SummaryEnglish: Akari and Mito help a viewer deal with their job-interview anxiety.

12.SummaryEnglish: The world's first virtual Youtuber-hosted sketch comedy show comes to a close.
